full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/20/2023 AFF.IDAVII 0 F SUPPORT e: OW, Soo King - applicant for Sec. 201 (b) immediate relative Applicant (s) Immigrant visa STATE 0 F CALIFORNIA ) ) SS CITY AND COUNTY OF LOS ANGELES ) MAY CHING CHOW, being first duly sworn according to law deposes and says: THAT she is a citizen of the United States by naturalization; that she is presently residing with her family at 18203 So. Dalton Ave., GARDENA LOS Angeles, California; that her petition on behlaf of her mother, the person named in the caption has been approved by the Immigration & Natz. Service; AFFIANT states that it is his (her) intention and desire to have the following person(s) to come to the United States: Name of Alien Sex Marital Status Age Relationship Country Born CHOW, Soo-King F widow 55 Mother China that the abovementioned person(s) is (are) presently residing at the address: AFFIANT states that she is more than willing to prov√®de for her mother Soo King Chow; that her financial status is shown by the copy of her income tax return of 1965 and letters from her Banks; AFFIANT states that she has suitable housing reserved for her mother as soon as she arrived in the United States; AFFIANT hereby warrants, promises and guarantees that he (she) will never allow all those herein mentioned become public charges upon the U.S. Government or any of its political subdivisions; AFFIANT further states that he (she) is willing and able to receive, maintain and support all those herein mentioned; that this affidavit is made for the information of the American Consul in connection with the application for visas filed by the abovementioned aliens and for the information of the Immigration Authorities at the port of arrival in the United States, and affiant hereby solemnly swears that the facts stated herein are true and correct to the best of his (her) knowledge and belief; FURTHER, Affiant sayeth not X may Ching Chow Signature of Affiant Subscribed and sworn to before me this 3rd Day of Feb. 967 at Los Angeles, State of California LOTUS MA NOTARY My commission expires on A Notary Public in and for My Commission Expires April 11. 1970 said County and State
